choices.name: BillToAndShipTo
choices.choiceText: Bill-To Address and Ship-To Address (the new address will be applied to both Bill-To and Ship-To)

choices.name: CopyBillTo
choices.choiceText: Copy the Bill-To Address to the Ship-To Address

choices.name: CopyShipTo
choices.choiceText: Copy the Ship-To Address to the Bill-To Address

rules.name: Copy_1_of_Is_valid
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10) OR 11
rules.label: Is valid

rules.name: Copy_2_of_Is_valid
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10) OR 11
rules.label: Is valid

rules.name: Copy_3_of_Is_valid
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10) OR 11
rules.label: Is valid

rules.name: Is_valid
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10) OR 11
rules.label: Is valid

rules.name: Is_valid_ord_ship
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10) OR 11
rules.label: Is valid

rules.name: Is_valid_order
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10) OR 11
rules.label: Is valid

Flow.description: 20/10/2023 CH: operating company assignment 07/11/2023 CH: changed flow label, added some changes 06/12/2023 CH: Liber custom address addition 24/01/2024 CH: added validation override

formulas.name: selectedAddressType_FORM
formulas.expression: IF({!Select_which_type_of_address_you_d_like_to_update}='Bill-To Address', 'bill-to', IF({!Select_which_type_of_address_you_d_like_to_update}='Ship-To Address', 'ship-to', IF({!Select_which_type_of_address_you_d_like_to_update}='Bill-To Address and Ship-To Address (the new address will be applied to both Bill-To and Ship-To)', 'both', IF({!Select_which_type_of_address_you_d_like_to_update}='Copy the Bill-To Address to the Ship-To Address', 'copy-bill', IF({!Select_which_type_of_address_you_d_like_to_update}='Copy the Ship-To Address to the Bill-To Address', 'copy-ship', 'additional')))))

formulas.name: selectedOrderAddressType_FORM
formulas.expression: IF({!Copy_1_of_Select_which_type_of_address_you_d_like_to_update}='Bill-To Address', 'bill-to', IF({!Copy_1_of_Select_which_type_of_address_you_d_like_to_update}='Ship-To Address', 'ship-to', IF({!Copy_1_of_Select_which_type_of_address_you_d_like_to_update}='Bill-To Address and Ship-To Address (the new address will be applied to both Bill-To and Ship-To)', 'both', IF({!Copy_1_of_Select_which_type_of_address_you_d_like_to_update}='Copy the Bill-To Address to the Ship-To Address', 'copy-bill', IF({!Copy_1_of_Select_which_type_of_address_you_d_like_to_update}='Copy the Ship-To Address to the Bill-To Address', 'copy-ship', 'additional')))))

Flow.label: Address_GenericAddressUpdater

fields.name: Would_you_like_to_add_another_address
fields.fieldText: Would you like to update another address?

fields.name: infoText
fields.fieldText: Please fill out the following information for the new {!selectedAddressType_FORM} address:

fields.name: errorMessage_disp
fields.fieldText: {!errorMessage}

fields.name: Override_the_address_validation
fields.fieldText: Override the address validation
fields.helpText: Only check this checkbox if you are sure that the address is valid, and if the address is not being validated by the system

fields.name: dspConfirm1
fields.fieldText:
The new shipping address will become the following:

Shipping Country: {!Get_Account_For_Details.BillingCountry}

Shipping Street: {!Get_Account_For_Details.BillingStreet}

Shipping ZIP/Postal Code: {!Get_Account_For_Details.BillingPostalCode}

Shipping City: {!Get_Account_For_Details.BillingCity}



Are you sure you'd like to continue?

fields.fieldText: Would you like to update another address?
